name: Abudu Bismark

name: Hassan
bio: I'm Hassan (on the left), and I was born in 1986 to Timilie and Assibi Abudu. I'm currently based in Accra, Ghana, working as a software engineer. I spend all day making and fixing web applications for technology companies abroad. Fun fact: I love art, especially photography. And most definitely music as well. But I'm a fan of most arts.

name: Francis Abudu
bio: Good evening to you all family. My name is Abudu Francis Ntoba. Am senior pastor of Shepherds Word Chapel Accra Lapaz. Am so happy today to be connected to my family may the good lord keep us safe.

name: Ayariga Martin Terry

I am an accountant by profession, and work mtn right here in the Upper East Region. Am married with three beautiful children ‚ù§, but I will be adding three more women to my register.üòÄ

name: Issah Abudu
bio: Hi, Thanks for the add. I am happy to be part of the family. üòÄ As far as the family tree is concerned I would say my dad is late Micheal Imoro Abudu and the second son.   I have two siblings Derrick Sadat Abudu and Victoria Abudu. I see Sadat is part of us here.  I currently work as an IT specialist for the Food and Drugs Administration in Atlanta. Nice to meet you all.

name: Magdalene Abudu
bio: Ok thank you very much. Am Magdalene Abudu. A sister to Kwame,  Laribas  daughter,  who is a sister  to sister ayampoka. The handsome manüòä in picture is my grandfather. Am a trained midwife  and am currently having my service  at Tema. Thank you. I am clear as much as possible

name: James
bio: Thank you very much for the privilege to be part of this great family of ours. My mother is a daughter of the family. Ayanniya, is her name. Her father is the late Mr Abagna, her mother is Awudaana. I am a great grandson to Mr Abudu. I am a nurse by profession (paediatric nurse). I just finished with masters degree at university of Ghana, but yet to graduate.
